javavis.jip2d.functions
Class FHistoKMeans

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPFunction
      javavis.jip2d.functions.FHistoKMeans
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FHistoKMeans
extends JIPFunction

Calculates the histograms of the input image and compares them to the ones in the image BD (got from the FCalcHistoBD). Using the L1 norm, the most similar image in the BD is returned and, depending of the perc parameter, some additional images can be returned. It does not process an image, but the complete sequence (but only the first image is processed). The returned sequence is ordered by distance: first, the image with the less distance, then the next one and so on until the percentage parameter is reached.

    Input parameters:
  • img: Input sequence to process
  • dir: Directory with the images to group
  • histo: Creates histograms when it's necessary
  • numk: Number of groups
  • type: Type of the image
  • algorithm: Distance to use
  • findBest: Applies KMedias until the result is acceptable
    Output parameters:

See Also:
Serialized Form
